titles.title: To amend the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area Act to adjust the boundary of the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area, and for other purposes.

Sloan Canyon Conservation and Lateral Pipeline Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-279.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 235.

action.text: Mr. Stauber moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 972.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H.R. 972.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
